response.overview: My main purpose of doing this short film was to show how truly deep and real my feelings are for the world we live in. I really wanted to express my feelings about traveling in a way that the viewer could feel too what I felt and hopefully even get inspired to do some travelling for themselves. By sharing my story, I want others to feel like they got some value out of it - to either get to know me better, or recognize themselves in it, or even feel inspired to go out and do what they love.
response.tagline: Are you infected by the Travel Bug?
response.title: The Travel Bug
